QuestData.Title: Round Two, Fish!
QuestData.Description:
How do you feel about doing a little fishing, then, $n?
There's a school of bait fish just offshore that the dumb beast attacks whenever they gather, forgetting that it's already dead.
Swim out there and wave that lure around, maybe do your best impression of a wounded seal, and it won't be able to resist.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText:
A terror of the deep.
Captain Haab's hunt saw them both perish, but even death has not cooled his lust for revenge.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's out there. I can feel it.
